item.worldinventories.angel_chest.info: §7§oLets you take your inventory to another dimension.§r
config.worldinventories.affect_creative: Set if Creative Players also change inventories.
config.worldinventories.ignored_dimensio: List of dimensions that the player can freely move their inventory into. Dimensions should be added via their IDs, and separated by ';'. Example: minecraft:overwolrd;minecraft:the_end
